name: UITabBarAppearance
desc: An object for customizing the appearance of a tab bar.

items.name: var stackedLayoutAppearance: UITabBarItemAppearance
items.desc: The appearance attributes for items with a stacked layout.

items.name: var stackedItemPositioning: UITabBar.ItemPositioning
items.desc: The scheme to use when positioning stacked items within the tab bar.

items.name: var stackedItemSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The amount of space to insert between stacked tab bar items.

items.name: var stackedItemWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: The width of stacked items in the tab bar.

items.name: var inlineLayoutAppearance: UITabBarItemAppearance
items.desc: The appearance attributes for items displayed with an inline style.

items.name: var compactInlineLayoutAppearance: UITabBarItemAppearance
items.desc: The appearance attributes for items displayed with an inline style in a compact environment.

items.name: var selectionIndicatorTintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The tint color to apply to the selection indicator image.

items.name: var selectionIndicatorImage: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to draw for the selected item.
